mainpage.header.message: 🌟 Welcome! We're connecting with technology here.
mainpage.header.title: Computer and Informatics Community
mainpage.header.description: If you're interested in technology, you're in the right place! Get ready to make amazing discoveries in the world of computers with BBT.
aboutus.header.message: 💬 Want to get to know us? Here's our story!
aboutus.header.title: About Us
aboutus.header.description: We are the most dynamic community at Kütahya Dumlupınar University. Our goal is to share knowledge in the field of computer and informatics and to grow together.
events.header.title: Our Events
events.header.description: From gamejams to hackathons, we are waiting for you with events where you can learn while having fun.
projects.header.message: 🚀 What we've done, what we're doing!
projects.header.title: Projects
projects.header.description: We share the projects developed by our members here. Get inspired and join us with your own project!
academy.header.title: BBT Academy
academy.header.description: We welcome everyone who is hungry for knowledge with our courses on computer sciences and the software world.
blog.header.title: Blog
blog.header.description: We share our thoughts and experiences about technology, software, and more here.
contact.header.title: Contact
contact.header.description: Got questions? Get in touch and connect with our community.
